context: In 2010, Zebra Technologies was primarily focused on barcode printers, RFID technology, and automatic identification solutions. The company had not yet made the transformative acquisition of Motorola Solutions' Enterprise business (which occurred in 2014).

competitors.name: Honeywell International
competitors.notes: Competitor in automatic identification and data capture products

competitors.name: Datalogic
competitors.notes: Competitor in barcode scanners and automatic data capture

competitors.name: Toshiba
competitors.notes: Competitor in barcode printing and data capture

competitors.name: Sato Holdings
competitors.notes: Competitor in barcode printing and RFID solutions
